user.title: Setup NSW Fuel Check
user.description:
Visit api.nsw.gov.au, subscribe to the FuelCheck API (free) and create an app (any name) to obtain your API Key and Secret.

API and data provided by NSW Fuel Check, Tasmanian data provided by Fuel Check TAS.

data.location: To find nearby fuel stations, click Submit to accept these coordinates from your Home zone or enter a location to find nearby stations.

station_select.title: Select Stations
station_select.description:
Select your favorite stations then **Submit**. You can select multiple stations before **Submit**.


Select "**Find more stations...**" (only) then **Submit** for advanced options to return here with different station choices.

data.selected_station_codes: Click to select your favorite stations

advanced_options.title: Advanced Selection
advanced_options.description:
Accept the "Home" location nickname or choose new name such as "Work" to group fuel stations by location.

You can create multiple locations by using "Add Entry" and choosing a new nickname. To add stations to an existing location, just enter the location nickname. To create a trip e.g. "Trip to work" use the same nickname and multiple locations.

data.fuel_type: To search for a station with a specific fuel, select from the dropdown.

error.auth: NSW Fuel API Key or API Secret is wrong.
error.connection: Error connecting to the server. Check logs.
error.invalid_coordinates: The latitude or longitude is invalid or outside NSW/TAS.
error.no_stations: Please use the drop down to select at least one station.
error.invalid_nickname: Invalid nickname, use letters, numbers '-'and '_' only.
error.sensor_exists: You have tried to configure an existing sensor for {station} ({fuel}). Choose a different station or fuel type.

abort.no_available_stations: Either you have already configured all nearby stations or try Add Service again with a different location.
abort.updated_existing: Added station(s) to existing nickname/location, or fuel to exisitng station.
